description: The Grafana dashboard of GreptimeDB cluster.

panels.description: Greptime DB version.
panels.title: Version

panels.description: Total memory allocated by frontend node. Calculated from jemalloc metrics and may vary from system metrics.
panels.title: Frontend Memory

panels.description: Total number of active frontend nodes in the cluster.

targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) FROM information_schema.cluster_info WHERE peer_type = 'FRONTEND';

panels.title: Frontend Num

panels.description: Total memory allocated by datanodes. Calculated from jemalloc metrics and may vary from system metrics.
panels.title: Datanode Memory

panels.description: Total number of active datanodes in the cluster.

targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) FROM information_schema.cluster_info WHERE peer_type = 'DATANODE';

panels.title: Datanode Num

panels.description: Total memory allocated by metasrv. Calculated from jemalloc metrics and may vary from system metrics.
panels.title: Metasrv Memory

panels.description: Total number of active metasrv instances

targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) FROM information_schema.cluster_info WHERE peer_type = 'METASRV';

panels.title: Metasrv Num

panels.description: User-created database count.

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name NOT IN ('greptime_private', 'information_schema')

panels.title: Databases

panels.description: Total number of tables.

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema != 'information_schema'

panels.title: Tables

panels.description: Total number of data file size.
panels.title: Storage Size

panels.description: Total number of rows ingested into the cluster, per second.
panels.title: Ingest Rows Rate

panels.description: Total number of rows ingested via /events/logs endpoint, per second.
panels.title: Log Ingest Rows Rate

panels.description: The approximate size of write-ahead logs
panels.title: WAL Size

panels.description: Total size of index files.
panels.title: Index Size

panels.description: Total size of manifest file size. Manifest is a our table format metadata stored on object storage.
panels.title: Manifest Size

panels.description: Total number of partitions in the cluster.
panels.title: Regions Count

panels.description: Total number of data rows in the cluster. Calculated by sum of rows from each region.
panels.title: Region Rows

panels.description:
Total rate data ingestion API calls by protocol.

Here we listed 3 primary protocols:

- Prometheus remote write
- Greptime's gRPC API (when using our ingest SDK)
- Log ingestion http API
panels.title: Ingestion

panels.description:
Total rate of query API calls by protocol. This metric is collected from frontends.

Here we listed 3 main protocols:
- MySQL
- Postgres
- Prometheus API

Note that there are some other minor query APIs like /sql are not included
panels.title: Queries

panels.description:
Memory usage information of datanodes.

There are three types of the metrics:

- allocated from jemalloc
- resident memory as stat from jemalloc
- process virtual memory
panels.title: Datanode Memory

panels.description:
Memory usage information of frontend.

There are three types of the metrics:

- allocated from jemalloc
- resident memory as stat from jemalloc
- process virtual memory
panels.title: Frontend Memory

panels.description:
Memory usage information of metasrv.

There are three types of the metrics:

- allocated from jemalloc
- resident memory as stat from jemalloc
- process virtual memory
panels.title: Metasrv Memory

panels.description: Current memory usage by instance
panels.title: Datanode Memory per Instance

panels.description: Current memory usage by instance
panels.title: Frontend Memory per Instance

panels.description: Current memory usage by instance
panels.title: Metasrv Memory per Instance

panels.description: Current cpu usage of all instances accumulated
panels.title: Datanode CPU Usage

panels.description: Current cpu usage of all instances accumulated
panels.title: Frontend CPU Usage

panels.description: Current cpu usage of all instances accumulated
panels.title: Metasrv CPU Usage

panels.description: Current cpu usage by instance
panels.title: Datanode CPU Usage per Instance

panels.description: Current cpu usage of all instances accumulated
panels.title: Frontend CPU Usage per Instance

panels.description: Current cpu usage of all instances accumulated
panels.title: Metasrv CPU Usage per Instance

panels.description: HTTP APIs QPS by instance, request url, http method and response status code
panels.title: HTTP QPS per Instance

panels.description: P99 latency of HTTP requests by instance, request url, http method and response code

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(pod, le, path, method, code) (rate(greptime_servers_http_requests_elapsed_bucket{pod=~"$frontend",path!~"/health|/metrics"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: HTTP P99 per Instance

panels.description: gRPC requests QPS on frontends by instance
panels.title: gRPC QPS per Instance

panels.description: gRPC latency p99 by instance

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(pod, le, path, code) (rate(greptime_servers_grpc_requests_elapsed_bucket{pod=~"$frontend"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: gRPC P99 per Instance

panels.description: MySQL query rate by instance
panels.title: MySQL QPS per Instance

panels.description: MySQL query latency p99 by instance
panels.title: MySQL P99 per Instance

panels.description: Postgres query rate by instance
panels.title: PostgreSQL QPS per Instance

panels.description: Postgres query latency p99 by instance
panels.title: PostgreSQL P99 per Instance

panels.description: Ingestion rate by row as in each frontend
panels.title: Ingest Rows per Instance

panels.description: Datanode query rate issued by each frontend
panels.title: Region Call QPS per Instance

panels.description: Datanode query latency at p99 as seen by each frontend
panels.title: Region Call P99 per Instance

panels.description: Counter of region migration by source and destination
panels.title: Region migration datanode

panels.description: Counter of region migration error
panels.title: Region migration error

panels.description: Gauge of load information of each datanode, collected via heartbeat between datanode and metasrv. This information is for metasrv to schedule workloads.
panels.title: Datanode load

panels.description: Datanode storage engine QPS by instance
panels.title: Request QPS per Instance

panels.description: Storage query latency at p99 by instance
panels.title: Request P99 per Instance

panels.description:
Memtable size on each instance.

The memtable holds unflushed data in memory and will flush it to object storage periodically or when size exceed configured limit.
panels.title: Write Buffer per Instance

panels.description:
Current counts for stalled write requests by instance

Write stalls when memtable is full and pending for flush
panels.title: Write Stall per Instance

panels.description:
Memtable flush rate by reason and instance.

There are several reasons when memtable get flushed. For example, it's full as in size, or reaching the time-to-flush, or by an artificial request.
panels.title: Flush QPS per Instance

panels.description: Cache size by instance.
panels.title: Cached Bytes per Instance

panels.description: Read QPS from the storage engine by instance.
panels.title: Read Stage QPS per Instance

panels.description: P99 latency of each type of reads by instance
panels.title: Read Stage P99 per Instance

panels.description:
Compaction operation rate.

Compaction happens when storage to merge and optimise data files.
panels.title: Compaction OPS per Instance

panels.description: Latency of compaction task, at p99
panels.title: Compaction P99 per Instance

panels.description: Write latency by instance and stage type
panels.title: Write Stage P99 per Instance

panels.description: Compaction latency by stage
panels.title: Compaction P99 per Instance

panels.description: Write-ahead logs write size as bytes. This chart includes stats of p95 and p99 size by instance, total WAL write rate.
panels.title: WAL write size

panels.description: Write-ahead log operations latency at p99
panels.title: Log Store op duration seconds

panels.description: Raft engine (local disk) log store sync latency, p99

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le, type, node, pod) (rate(raft_engine_sync_log_duration_seconds_bucket[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: WAL sync duration seconds

panels.description: Ongoing compaction task count
panels.title: Inflight Compaction

panels.description: Ongoing flush task count
panels.title: Inflight Flush

panels.description: object storage query rate by datanode and operation type
panels.title: QPS per Instance

panels.description: Total traffic as in bytes by instance and operation
panels.title: Opendal traffic

panels.description: Object storage read traffic rate as in bytes per second by instance
panels.title: Read QPS per Instance

panels.description: Read operation latency at p99
panels.title: Read P99 per Instance

panels.description: Object storage write traffic rate as in bytes per second by instance
panels.title: Write QPS per Instance

panels.description: Write operation latency at p99
panels.title: Write P99 per Instance

panels.description: Object storage list traffic rate as in bytes per second by instance
panels.title: List QPS per Instance

panels.description: List operation latency at p99

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(pod, le, scheme) (rate(opendal_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{pod=~"$datanode", operation="list"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: List P99 per Instance

panels.description: Object storage traffic rate other than read/write/list/stat as in bytes per second by instance
panels.title: Other Requests per Instance

panels.description: All other operation latency at p99

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(pod, le, scheme, operation) (rate(opendal_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{pod=~"$datanode", operation!~"read|write|list"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Other Request P99 per Instance

title: GreptimeDB Cluster Metrics
